derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from Latin videre 'to see', on the pattern of audio

entry.def: A video is a film or television programme recorded on tape for people to watch on a television set.

example.ex: We were watching videos with her.
example.tran: 我们当时在和她一起看录像。

entry.def: Video is the system of recording films and events on tape so that people can watch them on a television set.

example.ex: She has watched the race on video.

example.tran: 录音和录像设备的制造商

entry.def: A video is a machine that you can use to record television programmes and play videotapes on a television set.

example.tran: 他把录像机的时间设在8点钟。

entry.def: If you video a television programme or event, you record it on tape using a video recorder or video camera, so that you can watch it later.

example.ex: She had been videoing the highlights of the tournament...
example.tran: 她一直在制作锦标赛集锦的录像。

example.ex: The club specialises in videoing its student golfers to correct their faults.
example.tran: 俱乐部专门为高尔夫学员制作录像，以纠正他们的错误。

entry.def: Video is a system by which you can see television images or films on your computer, rather than on a television set.

means.word_mean: 1. the visible part of a television transmission;

sentences.sentence: "they could still receive the sound but the picture was gone"

means.word_mean: 2. a recording of both the video and audio components (especially one containing a recording of a movie or television program)
3. broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects;

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

Sentence.sentence: The video machine has to be checked.
watching TV and videos was most popular.
Several of the employees in the computer department, for example, claim to be developing vision problems from having to stare at a video display terminal for about 7 hours a day.
As they walk around a playground or other area, text, video or audio pops up at various points to help them try to figure out why aliens were in the schoolyard.

Since luxury is a function of scarcity, the children of tomorrow will long for nothing more than intervals of freedom from all the blinking machines, streaming videos and scrolling headlines that leave them feeling empty and too full all at once.
